name: PIVOT (Josh Perry)
description:
A ludum dare game made in a few hours before being dropped :(

The objective is to get the red shapes (furniture) through the hallway into the right place, cutting (sacrificing) parts off to fit it. You get scored based on how much of the thing you managed to preserve.

Controls
WASD to move, QE to rotate
Left click to cut the shape across the line
Right click to flip the cutting line horizontally
